name: The Flower God - Adventures with Depression
name_original: The Flower God - Adventures with Depression
description:
WARNING: Contains suicide & self-harm

This is a short game for depressed people that I made with Bitsy in one day. My first to ever be completed.
It's a bit surreal and a bit personal.

Move with the arrow keys or WASD.
Interact with things by walking on them.

There's two endings.
